verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609> of David. <WH1732> LORD, <WH3068> my heart <WH3820> is not <WH3808> haughty, <WH1361> nor <WH3808> mine eyes <WH5869> lofty: <WH7311> neither <WH3808> do I exercise <WH1980> myself in great matters, <WH1419> or in things too high <WH6381> for <WH4480> me.

Surely <WH518> <WH3808> I have behaved <WH7737> and quieted <WH1826> myself, <WH5315> as a child that is weaned <WH1580> of <WH5921> his mother: <WH517> my soul <WH5315> is even as a weaned child. <WH1580>
Let Israel <WH3478> hope <WH3176> in <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> from henceforth <WH4480> <WH6258> and forever. <WH5704> <WH5769>
